entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
